channel.title: Comments on: This Week in Genesis (1 May 2015)
channel.description: The best new WordPress Genesis things

item.title: By: Nick Davis
item.dc:creator: Nick Davis
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://genesiswp.guide/2015-05-01/#comment-19">Matt Ryan</a>.
Thanks Matt, it's nice to dust off the writing skills and put them to good use. I'm a big fan of the Daily Bolt too.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Matt Ryan.

Thanks Matt, it’s nice to dust off the writing skills and put them to good use. I’m a big fan of the Daily Bolt too.

item.title: By: Nick Davis
item.dc:creator: Nick Davis
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://genesiswp.guide/2015-05-01/#comment-18">Marjorie Ray</a>.
Thanks Marjorie

item.title: By: Matt Ryan
item.dc:creator: Matt Ryan
item.description:
Nick, Found my way here through The Daily Bolt. You have put together an excellent resource here. Clean, easy to read, nice narrative on the links - good personal touches.
All the best. Matt
item.content:encoded:
Nick,
Found my way here through The Daily Bolt. You have put together an excellent resource here. Clean, easy to read, nice narrative on the links – good personal touches.

All the best.
Matt

item.title: By: Marjorie Ray
item.dc:creator: Marjorie Ray
item.description: This is a great round-up of info! Thanks for posting. And I'm so happy to hear about Sridhar's success. I've always appreciated his help and support. I hope some of these great folks above will be presenting at the upcoming online event http://genesis.camp in July. All the best, Marjorie
item.content:encoded:
This is a great round-up of info! Thanks for posting. And I’m so happy to hear about Sridhar’s success. I’ve always appreciated his help and support. I hope some of these great folks above will be presenting at the upcoming online event http://genesis.camp in July.
All the best,
Marjorie

item.title: By: Nick Davis
item.dc:creator: Nick Davis
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://genesiswp.guide/2015-05-01/#comment-16">Jon Barratt</a>.
Hey Jon, you're very welcome, the site looks great. And, thanks for the kind words. The Lean Kickstart design was done by the awesome Derry Birkett (@derrybirkett).
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Jon Barratt.

Hey Jon, you’re very welcome, the site looks great. And, thanks for the kind words. The Lean Kickstart design was done by the awesome Derry Birkett (@derrybirkett).

item.title: By: Jon Barratt
item.dc:creator: Jon Barratt
item.description:
Hey Nick!
Thanks so much for the mention. Love the clean look of your sites and Lean's Kickstart looks fantastic. Big congrats must go to Sridhar too.
Best always Jon
item.content:encoded:
Hey Nick!

Thanks so much for the mention. Love the clean look of your sites and Lean’s Kickstart looks fantastic. Big congrats must go to Sridhar too.

Best always
Jon

item.title: By: Nick Davis
item.dc:creator: Nick Davis
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://genesiswp.guide/2015-05-01/#comment-14">Dave R</a>.
Thanks Dave!

item.title: By: Dave R
item.dc:creator: Dave R
item.description:
Thanks for assembling all of the info in one easy to access post. Some of it I'd seen but there were parts I hadn't seen and would have missed if you had not posted it.
Keep up the great work.
item.content:encoded:
Thanks for assembling all of the info in one easy to access post. Some of it I’d seen but there were parts I hadn’t seen and would have missed if you had not posted it.

Keep up the great work.

item.title: By: Nick Davis
item.dc:creator: Nick Davis
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://genesiswp.guide/2015-05-01/#comment-12">Ryan Sullivan</a>.
Thanks buddy, I think it's a really interesting area, appreciate the support!
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Ryan Sullivan.

Thanks buddy, I think it’s a really interesting area, appreciate the support!

item.title: By: Ryan Sullivan
item.dc:creator: Ryan Sullivan
item.description: Hey Nick, appreciate the mention :) Good luck on your new project here. Curation is all the rage right now, so you're getting in at at good time.
item.content:encoded: Hey Nick, appreciate the mention ðŸ™‚ Good luck on your new project here. Curation is all the rage right now, so you’re getting in at at good time.
